com.revature.GSQL.ObjectMapper

Class ObjectCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.GSQL.ObjectMapper.ObjectCache

  • public class ObjectCache
extends java.lang.Object
    class which hands caching objects stored in database tables. Singleton so no more than one instance can exists at a given time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ObjectCache getInstance()

      • getCache

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Class<?>,java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Object>> getCache()
        Returns:
        HashMap cache of objects. key = class, value = HashSet of all objects of that class.

      • putObjInCache

        public void putObjInCache(java.lang.Object obj)
        Places an object into the cache.
        Parameters:
        obj - object to place inside of cache.

      • getObjFromCache

        public java.util.Optional<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> getObjFromCache(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.reflect.Method> getters,
                                                                            java.lang.String[] columns,
                                                                            java.lang.String[] conditions,
                                                                            java.lang.String[] operators)
        Method checks if object or objects matching criteria already exists in database. If match is found, it is added to a list. that list is then returned inside of an optional. If no match is found then an empty optional is returned.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class of object to check for.
        getters - HashMap of annotated getters inside of class.
        columns - String[] of columns to check for.
        conditions - String[] of values that the columns should match
        operators - String[] of operators(AND/OR) to apply to columns.
        Returns:
        Optional containing List of objects which match the conditions provided.

      • removeObjFromCache

        public void removeObjFromCache(java.lang.Object obj)
        Remove an object from cache.
        Parameters:
        obj - object to remove from cache.
